name: ZAAM
description:
ZAAM is a first person exploration game, It is an unsettling story about obsession over a mysterious machine, as you unravel the story a dark and ominous truth will come forth.
The story is being told through the game mood, characters and visual storytelling.

Created by Alonzu, Creator of first person exploration game "it's always monday"
I post updates about the game on twitter at @alonzubin.
